when.test: (startDate != null and startDate != '') and (endDate != null and endDate != '')

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BF_PROD_PLAN P JOIN BF_PROD_PLAN_HD H USING (PLAN_HD_CODE) JOIN (SELECT D.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, D.INST_PROD_INDICA_VOL, N.PLAN_HD_CODE FROM BF_PROD_INSTRUCTION N JOIN BF_PROD_INST_DETAIL D USING (INST_NO)) I USING (PLAN_HD_CODE) WHERE I.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = P.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE AND I.inst_prod_indica_vol < P.plan_prod_vol

SELECT * FROM (SELECT L.*, F.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME FROM BF_PROD_PLAN L JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE F ON L.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = F.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE) P JOIN BF_PROD_PLAN_HD H USING(PLAN_HD_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT H.VEND_CD_CODE, H.VEND_CD_NM, D.* FROM (SELECT SLS_ORD_HD_NO, VEND_CD_CODE, VEND_CD_NM FROM BF_CMN_VENDOR_CODE JOIN BF_SALES_ORD_HD USING (VEND_CD_CODE)) H JOIN (SELECT SLS_ORD_HD_NO, SLS_ORD_DTL_NO, SLS_ORD_DTL_DLV_DATE, SLS_ORD_DTL_VOL, SLS_ORD_DTL_PRG_CLS FROM BF_SALES_ORD_DTL) D ON H.SLS_ORD_HD_NO = D.SLS_ORD_HD_NO) O USING (SLS_ORD_HD_NO) WHERE 1=1
AND VEND_CD_CODE = #{vendorCd}

SELECT H.PLAN_HD_CODE, H.PLAN_HD_NAME, H.SLS_ORD_HD_NO, H.EMP_ID, H.PLAN_HD_DATE, H.PLAN_HD_REMK, P.PLAN_IDX, P.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, F.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME, P.PLAN_PROD_VOL, P.PLAN_SDATE, P.PLAN_EDATE, P.PLAN_REMK FROM BF_PROD_PLAN P JOIN BF_PROD_PLAN_HD H ON P.PLAN_HD_CODE = H.PLAN_HD_CODE JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE F ON P.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = F.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE
